item.description:
Saturday Oct 28th at 1pm at Cafe Paradiso in Harvard Square

Following up on the popularity of a weekend get-together, a Saturday afternoon chat at Cafe Paradiso in Harvard Square, Cambridge.
Totally informal but should be fun!
Thanks Elizabeth for the suggestion.
Anyone who's going, look for each other and bring materials to practice if you're a learner, and some $ to buy a cup of coffee or something from the cafe.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Sat. 10/28 1p at Cafe Paradiso, Hvd Sq- Mandarin chat!
